title: 68(4)(b), 159(5)(a), 160(5)(a) and 279(2) of the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Fisheries (Commercial Fishing Licences)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Fisheries (Commercial Fishing Licences) 

(Alteration of Duties and Fees) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited fishery (commercial fishing licences) (alteration duty fees) order 2022

title: 68(4)(b), 159(5)(a), 160(5)(a) and 279(2) of the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act
heading: 2. This Order comes into operation on the 1 day of March 2022 and has
text_raw:
2. This Order comes into operation on the 1 day of March 2022 and has 
effect as respects licences issued or renewed for a period commencing on or after 
that day.
text_norm: 2 order come operation 1 day march 2022 effect respect licence issued renewed period commencing day

title: 68(4)(b), 159(5)(a), 160(5)(a) and 279(2) of the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act
heading: In this Order -
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order - 

“Act of 1994” means the Fisheries (Amendment) Act 1994 (No. 23 of 1994); 

“Principal Act” means the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act 1959 (No. 14 of 1959).
text_norm: 3 order - act 1994 mean fishery (amendment) act 1994 (no 23 1994) principal act mean fishery (consolidation) act 1959 (no 14 1959)

title: 68(4)(b), 159(5)(a), 160(5)(a) and 279(2) of the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act
heading: 4. The ordinary licence duty in respect of an ordinary fishing licence
text_raw:
4. The ordinary licence duty in respect of an ordinary fishing licence 
authorising the use of a fishing engine of a kind specified in column (2) of the 
Schedule at any reference number is altered to the sum specified in column (3) 
of the Schedule at that reference number.
text_norm: 4 ordinary licence duty respect ordinary fishing licence authorising use fishing engine kind specified column (2) schedule reference number altered sum specified column (3) schedule reference number

title: 68(4)(b), 159(5)(a), 160(5)(a) and 279(2) of the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act
heading: 5. The licence duty in respect of an oyster fishing licence is altered to €94.
text_raw: 5. The licence duty in respect of an oyster fishing licence is altered to €94.
text_norm: 5 licence duty respect oyster fishing licence altered eur94

title: 68(4)(b), 159(5)(a), 160(5)(a) and 279(2) of the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act
heading: 6. The sum standing specified in section 159(1)(b)(ii) of the Principal Act
text_raw:
6. The sum standing specified in section 159(1)(b)(ii) of the Principal Act 

is altered to €128.
text_norm: 6 sum standing specified section 159(1)(b)(ii) principal act altered eur128

title: 68(4)(b), 159(5)(a), 160(5)(a) and 279(2) of the Fisheries (Consolidation) Act
heading: 7. The sum standing specified in section 160(1)(b) of the Principal Act is
text_raw:
7. The sum standing specified in section 160(1)(b) of the Principal Act is 

altered to €128. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8. The Fisheries (Commercial Fishing Licences) (Alteration of Duties and 

Fees) Order 2010 (S.I. No. 40 of 2010) is revoked. 

[173] 3 

 
 
 
 
 4 [173]
